#CMRs

"CMRs are substances that are carcinogenic, mutagenic, or toxic to reproduction. In other words, they have inherent properties that can cause cancer, alter DNA or damage reproductive systems. These properties correspond to article 57 a-c of REACH."

"CMR agent

"Asbestos. Carcinogenic, mutagenic, reprotoxic (CMR) substances. Reproductive effects caused by chemical and biological agents."

CMR substances

"CMR substances are chemical substances (or mixtures) of specific concern due to the long term and serious effects that they may have on human health. Reprotoxic stands for chemical substances which may affect sexual function and fertility of adults, as well as causing developmental toxicity in the offspring."
